section.heading: Funding for the Ombudsman Program.

para.text: Funding sources for the Ombudsman Program shall include:
Medicaid and other available federal matching funds.

Nothing in this chapter shall prohibit a corporation, organization, or consortia of organizations selected to operate the Health Care and Public Benefits Ombudsman Program from raising private money through foundation resources to supplement government funds for the program.
